metadataAttributes.Title: Real-World Engineering Management Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Sponsored by AWS. Is software engineering management (EM or SDM) right for you? How do you get your first, or next, EM role? Learn software engineering management from Nancy Wang, one of the youngest directors of engineering and general managers at AWS, and 5 other top engineering managers who make hiring and promotion decisions in the industry. Learn the most common interview questions, and, more importantly, how to answer them to demonstrate to interviewers at Amazon, Google, Microsoft, and startups that you are most qualified to to lead their teams. And scale those teams to build the products that billions of people use billions of times per day.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Engineering Manager Interviews, Engineering management, Real-World Examples, Technical Program Management, Technology Leadership, People Management, Business Strategy, Cloud Engineering, Software Engineering, Program Management,
